about_the_game:
1. Winter and summer high-res textures for vehicles and guns:
    • GAZ-MM
    • Pz I ausf. F
    • PzB. 41
    • T-60 mod. 1941
    • Pz III ausf. N
    • Pz III ausf. J (kz and lg)
    • Pz III ausf. L and Fl
    • Pz II ausf. C and F
    • T-26 mod. 1939 and 1940
    • Marder II Sdkfz 131 and 132
    • Marder III ausf. H
    • StuG III ausf. F/8
    • BA-64
    • Sdkfz 231/232 8-rad.
    • Sdkfz 251/1, 251/2, 251/9, 251/10
    • T-34 mod. 1941 and 1942
    • Mk II Matilda and Matilda CS
    • KV-1 mod. 1942 with cast, RF cast and simple weld turrets
  2. Textures for weathering and tracks

Try demo first!
  1. Download k43t_hir_tex_probe_mar13.gt2extension
  2. Install through in-game updater
  3. Check winter and summer high-res textures for vehicles and guns:
    • GAZ-MM
    • Pz I ausf. F
    • PzB. 41
    • T-60 mod. 1942
    • Pz III ausf. N

name: Graviteam Tactics: Hi-Res Textures

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP2 or Vista
  • Processor: AMD Athlon 2000\Intel Pentium 2400GHz [Game demands support of instructions SSE by the processor]
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon 9500\nVidia GeForce 6600 128 Mb [NOTE: Game is not started on video cards series nVidia GeForce FX]
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 Compatible Sound Card

short_description: High Resolution texture pack featuring Winter and Summer textures for vehicles and guns, and textures for weathering and tracks.
